bibdata.abstract: Amendment to IEEE Std 802.3-2005 This amendment to IEEE Std 802.3-2005 specifies a new PMD, 10GBASE-LRM, for serial, 10 Gb/s operation over up to 220 m of 62.5 &#181;m and 50 &#181;m multimode fiber, including installed, FDDI grade multimode fiber

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
